heroSection.headingText: Freelance Software Developer with <0>25+ years of experience</0>

softwareDevelopment.imageTitle: Illustration of a programmer by his computer
softwareDevelopment.paragraph1: Are you looking for someone to build a software solution for you? Or do you need new skillede developers for your existing team?
softwareDevelopment.paragraph2: During years, I've learned to master a wide range of programming languages and paradigms. I am a keep practitioner of TDD (Test-Driven Development) - a technique often misunderstood. But when applied correctly it will lead to a more maintainable code base, fewer bugs, AND an increate in productivity up front
softwareDevelopment.paragraph3: I am comfortable working both on my own, and in larger teams and organisations, where I never loose focus of the buniess processes in need of optimisation

section1.heading: Courses
section1.paragraph1: Is your software development department in need of learning a new technology? Is your .NET web app no longer sufficient? I offer custom courses to help kickstart your department

section2.heading: Remote training and pair programming
section2.paragraph1: With the aid of pair programming session I can support your journey to a new technology stack, or teach improved efficiency by properly applying TDD
section2.paragraph2: Contact me to learn more about courses and traning

courses.imageCaption: An illustration of a techer performing the sign of the horns? AI still has its limitations
